Html: HI there, QUick question, can Oxite handle rendering pages specific to mobile devices requests? Nixon

Nothing built-in, no, but it's fairly easy to add views that are specific to a mobile device.  There are also lots of 3rd party libraries out there for detecting specifics of devices.

Just remember, Oxite hasn't been worked on for the last year and a half and you should probably take a look at Orchard unless you're just trying to learn from Oxite.
